parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The reason why you want to grant permissions on resources to the users by using the permission template.

parameters.name: ExpireDate
parameters.description: The time when the permission expires. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-DD HH:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the permission template.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to query the tenant ID.

parameters.name: UserIds
parameters.description: The IDs of users to which you want to grant permissions on resources by using the permission template.
